definitions.definition: A mythical snake -like dragon , so venomous that even its gaze is deadly .
examples: the deadly look of the basilisk

definitions.definition: An infohazard or cognitohazard , especially a Langford's basilisk .
A type of dragon used in heraldry.
Any of the tree-dwelling of lizard of the genus Basiliscus : the basilisk lizard .
A type of large brass cannon .

main_definition: ( mythology ) A mythical snake -like dragon , so venomous that even its gaze is deadly .
secondary_definitions: ( science fiction ) An infohazard or cognitohazard , especially a Langford's basilisk .
( heraldry ) A type of dragon used in heraldry.
Any of the tree-dwelling of lizard of the genus Basiliscus : the basilisk lizard .
( weaponry ) A type of large brass cannon .
